workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Backup and recovery operations for Oracle Database 23ai

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to performing backup and recovery operations in Oracle Database 23ai.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup compute instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and setup the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Configure recovery settings
tutorials.description: How to configure the Oracle Database for several recovery settings.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Configure backup settings
tutorials.description: How to configure the database for several backup-related settings and policies.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Perform backups
tutorials.description: How to use RMAN to perfrom backups.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Manage backups
tutorials.description: How to manage backups after you create them.

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Restore Database
tutorials.description: How to use RMAN commands to restore database.

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Rewind a table using Oracle Flashback Table
tutorials.description: How to rewind one or more tables to their contents at a previous time without affecting other database objects.

tutorials.title: Lab 10: Recover a dropped table using Oracle Flashback Drop
tutorials.description: How to reverse the effects of dropping (deleting) a table, returning the dropped table to the database along with dependent objects such as indexes and triggers.

tutorials.title: Need help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to common problems and directions for receiving live help
